issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description: Seems to randomly occur due to a possible race condition.
fields.summary: ELB Instances page doesn't always automatically select instances in the ELB

comments.body: I was able to see this easily after adding a separate instance to an elb that was already a member of an ASG. When the instances tab was refreshed, the selected instance was not checked any longer. If the user were to hit "save", the instance would become removed.

This was an early directive attempt. Most, if not all of the event passing should be replaced with directive attribute binding.
The controller uses a ton of jquery bindings which should be replaced with model bindings in the template. Overall, this is ripe for a total re-write. This page has re-load requirements in GUI-2130 which, perhaps could encompass this re-write.

[~dkavanagh]: Sorry for the confusion.  It seems the ELB instances page automatically de-registering the ASG instances issue is on master as well.  I'm investigating and will open a separate ticket with info to reproduce.
[~dkavanagh]: I've filed GUI-2624 to track the ASG instance de-registration issue

The scope binding change Adam suggested also addressed the error you noticed. From what I can tell, the wizard doesn't try suppling an instances list, so it doesn't need to pass one into the directive.

PR 1974 looks good to me.

[~ashamblin]: Do you want another look at PR 1974 before we merge it?
I have reviewed, and I like the change.  Merge at will.

Verified ELB instances (and ASG instances if ELB fronts the scaling group) are consistently selected when loading instances tab on ELB details page.

Verified on: shared setup (region-one) - https://g-05-03.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
Account: kamalgill/admin
Tested on: Chrome (incognito mode) Version 51.0.2704.84 (64-bit)
Tested on: IE 11 on Windows 8.1 (Version 11.0.9600.18350)
Release: 0.9494.206.git085446d.el7

Further testing indicates this issue intermittently surfaces, possibly when latency isn't fairly snappy (indicating a race condition).  We may need to mark this as a known issue for 4.3.0.  For example, on https://10.111.1.53 in account eucalyptus/admin the selected instances for an ELB aren't always automatically checked (testing in Chrome).

Punted to 4.3.1 due to non-trivial fix.  Also added NeedsKnownIssue label for 4.3.0.

/cc [~tvo]

I observed on VPC setup https://10.111.1.53 when tested on Firefox that instances attached to elb were not showing in the "Instances" tab  !Screen Shot 2016-07-08 at 11.02.40 AM.png|thumbnail! however, as indicated in the monitoring tab, there is one healthy instance attached to that ELB   !Screen Shot 2016-07-08 at 11.03.00 AM.png|thumbnail!  

I had experienced intermittent failures to attach instances, also the attached instances would not show as attached after monitoring tab refresh.
